data: {"generalSituation":"An easterly airstream will affect the coast of Guangdong in the next couple of days. It will become cloudier gradually over the region, and the weather will be relatively humid. Under the influence of the northeast monsoon, it will be brighter over Guangdong midweek next week. A broad band of clouds is expected to cover southern China in the latter part of next week. A replenishment of the monsoon will affect the region over the next weekend.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20260125","week":"Sunday","forecastWind":"East force 4 to 5, occasionally force 6 on high ground.","forecastWeather":"Mainly cloudy. Sunny periods during the day.
